alert.note: Alert for Lavaca (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 24 at 9:51AM CST until January 26 at 10:06AM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Houston/Galveston TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... Navidad River at Sublime affecting Lavaca County. For the Navidad River...including Sublime, Speaks, Morales, Strane Park...Major flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Major flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Navidad River at Sublime. * WHEN...Until late Friday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 21.7 feet. - Bankfull stage is 20.0 feet - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 30.0 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 30.0 feet on 05/25/1975. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Navidad River Sublime 24.0 21.7 Wed 9 am CST 29.2 16.3 10.0 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 400 AM CST.
